name: Sub-Power!
description:
Our sub is running out of power! Quickly comrade, jump on the bike and charge the battery! Our only hope is if their sub has the same issue...

Player 1 Controls

  • W - Forward
  • A/D - Turn Left/Right
  • R - Mash to generate energy!
  • Spacebar - Shoot Missile

Player 2 Controls

  • Up Arrow - Forward
  • Left/Right Arrow - Turn Left/Right
  • Period (Full Stop) - Mash to generate energy!
  • Forward Slash - Shoot Missile

Code: https://thetruehat.itch.io/

Art: https://rebelliousrobot.itch.io/

SFX source: http://soundbible.com/tags-submarine.html#:~:text=Submarine%20Sounds%20%20%20%20...
